name: Warden of the Arcaen
description:
Warden of the Arcaen is a dating sim style visual novel. The player will get to choose between dating men or women at the beginning of the game, play as 'Friends to Lovers' OR 'Enemies to Lovers'. Immerse yourself in this modern fantasy world and explore magical relationships!



Story:

You are going to visit your Uncle Charlie after your nightmares worsen, and you think he may be able to help. He has studied the folklore behind monsters known as 'Arcaen' his whole life. But when you arrive, it seems the Arcaen aren't just stories. . . Getting to know them is the now part of your job, and balancing those relations- won't always be easy. . .



Features:

Customizable Player Name
21 Complete Endings
5 Romanceable Characters (For Both Male & Female Presenting)
Friends to Lovers Routes
Enemies to Lovers Routes
Vampires, Werewolves, Fae, Gargoyles, & Witches
Completed Game
175,000 + Words
Turn On / Off Mature Content
Descriptive Romance Scenes
Many Choices Throughout
And so much more!



What are the 'Arcaen'?

As you play you get to unpack the mystery of the 'Arcaen', a name grouping together the Vampires, Werewolves, the Fae, Witches, & Gargoyles in this game.



Meet The Characters

You will notice characters that there are male and female versions of each character. You get to choose which at the beginning of the game.

Aspen: A Fae, who enjoys a bit mischief as much as a bit of gardening.

Taylor: A Gargoyle, who has sworn to protect your family for generations, whether you like it or not.

Logan: A Werewolf, hoping to make a friend in this divided community.

Morgan: A Witch, who is sometimes out of touch with the world outside of magical society.

Beck: A Vampire, a hopeless flirt who wishes your family would stop roping him into their problems.
